item.title: Arm wrestling (Boys)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Arm wrestling (Boys)

Rules

  1. Knock-Out
  2. 1 Match = 3 Round
  3. The player winning 2 rounds out of 3 will win the match.
  4. There is No time limit.
  5. One who’s back of the palm touches the surface first loses.
[league_table id="307"  number="4" title="" tid="439,441,440,438"  columns="points" show_team_logo="0" show_full_table_link="0" align="none"  competition="Arm wrestling (Boys)"]

item.title: Badminton (Mix-Doubles)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Rules

Knock-out

  1. 1 Match = 3 Rounds of 15 points each.
  2. The team gaining the 15 points first will win the round.
  3. The team winning 2 rounds out of 3 will win the match.
  4. At 14 all, the team gaining the 15 point first will when there will be no 2 lead Rule in Knock Out.
  5. If a team manages to grab 7 – nil, then the opponent team will lose the Round Automatically so the opponent Team has to grab at least 1 point to stay in the game.

Semi-Final or Final:

  1. 1 Match = 3 Rounds of 15 points each.
  2. The team gaining the 15 points first will win the round.
  3. The team winning 2 rounds out of 3 will win the match.
  4. At 14 all, the team gaining 2 points lead will win the match.
  5. If a team manages to grab 7 – nil, then the opponent team will lose the Round Automatically so the opponent Team has to grab at least 1 point to stay in the game.
[league_table id="360"  number="4" title="" tid="299,300,301,302"  columns="points" show_team_logo="0" show_full_table_link="0" align="none"  ] [winnerImg  player_name="Vivek Mitra" team_name="House Lannisters" bg_color="#82BC00"]

item.title: Banana Relay Race
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Relay Race

Rules

  1. Team = 8 Players
  2. Team that will complete the race in least time will be the winner.
[league_table id="307"  number="4" title="" tid="438,439,440,441"  columns="points" show_team_logo="0" show_full_table_link="0" align="none"  competition="Banana Relay Race"]

item.title: Blind Walk
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Blind Walk

Rules

  1. 1 team member will be blind folded while others will have to guide him using their voices to reach its destination through given path
  2. The path will have multiple curves, turns and obstacle
  3. Touching any obstacle, touching the blind folded player by its team mate or stepping out of the path will be considered as foul
  4. For each foul, extra 5 seconds will be added to the time
  5. The team reaching the destination in least time will be the winner
[league_table id="307"  number="4" title="" tid="438,439,440,441"  columns="points" show_team_logo="0" show_full_table_link="0" align="none"  competition="Blind Walk"]

item.title: Chess
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Chess

Rules

  1. 1 Match = 1 Round
  2. Time Limit = 45 Min
  3. After time limit, the player with more points will win the match
[league_table id="307"  number="4" title="" tid="438,439,440,441"  columns="points" show_team_logo="0" show_full_table_link="0" align="none"  competition="Chess"]

item.title: Cricket
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Cricket

Rules

  1. Team – 11 Players
  2. There will be 6 overs in each innings.
  3. Minimum 3 overs must be delivered by Girls.
  4. 1 Player can only deliver 1 over.
  5. NO BALLS and WIDE will not be counted as official ball and 1 run will be scored by the opponent team.
  6. Byes and Leg Byes are allowed.
  7. Direct Catch and one bounce one hand catch will be considered as out
  8. Ball going directly outside the Box without interference by opponent team will be considered as OUT else considered as 4 runs.
  9. striker or none striker must be female player until all female player declared OUT
  10. bowler must require to bowl from bowling box, also feet remain grounded while bowling else considered as No ball.
  11. Runs made in Super Over will be calculated double.
  12. The batting team can claim one super over from the 6 overs before a bowler comes for the delivery.
  13. UMPIRE DECISION WILL BE FINAL AND NO ARGUMENTS WILL BE ENTERTAINED WITH THE UMPIRE
  14. In case of tie, an extra over will be played.
[league_table id="307"  number="4" title="" tid="438,439,440,441"  columns="points" show_team_logo="0" show_full_table_link="0" align="none"  competition="Cricket"]

item.title: Dart (Boys)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Dart (Boys)

Rules

  1. Point Based
  2. Each player will get 30 darts.
  3. Maximum scorer will be the winner.
  4. In case of a tie, additional 10 darts will be given.
[league_table id="307"  number="4" title="" tid="438,439,440,441"  columns="points" show_team_logo="0" show_full_table_link="0" align="none"  competition="Dart (Boys)"]

item.title: Dodge ball
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Dodge ball

Rules

  1. Turn based: 5 minutes to each team
  2. Team size: 8
  3. A circle will be drawn, defending team will be staying inside the circle, and attacking team will be staying around the circle outside of drawn line and trying to out the players inside. Team that able to out maximum members will be winner.
  4. In case both the team are able to out all the members of team, team that able to out other team in less time will be winner.
  5. In case of tie, a tie breaker round additional one minute time will be given and it will continue till tie does not occur
[league_table id="307"  number="4" title="" tid="438,439,440,441"  columns="points" show_team_logo="0" show_full_table_link="0" align="none"  competition="Dodge ball"]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Satodiyu
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Satodiyu

Rules

  1. To start the game two team with equal number of players are required.
  2. To decide who shall take the attacking role first, a coin is tossed.
  3. Seven stones or any of the substitutes should be on top of each other as a pile within a circle. The defending team will take their positions for the fielding purpose. The position of fielding team will be wicket keeper who will be standing behind the stones and others around the stones randomly as fielders stand in cricket. All the players belonging to the attacking team will be taking their position behind the crease line in an appropriate distance away from the pile of stones.
  4. The attacking team will be getting three chances to hit the pile of stones with the ball in either of the ways i.e. underarm or overarm, to knock the pile of stones.
  5. The attacking team has to hit the pile of stones in three hit.
  6. Under arm throw will not allowed.
  7. Opponent player catches the ball in one tip and stones are not destructed then the player will be out and the next player will come.
  8. If the opponent player cannot catch the ball and stones are also not destructed, then he will get another chance up to three. After three chances he will be out and the next player will attack.
  9. If the opponent player catches the ball without tip after stones are destructed, then whole team will be out.
  10. If they fail, then the defending and attacking team interchange places and continue to play, with one point to the defending team in the case of worst aiming skills of the attacking team.
  11. The opponent player cannot catch the ball and the stones are destructed, then the real game begins.
  12. As soon as the ball knocks off the pile of stones, the defender team will get hold of the ball and try their best to get 2 opponent team members OUT by hitting them with the ball.
  13. The aim of the attacking team is to rearrange the pile of stones and trace the circle one time with their fingers before the other team can make all the players OUT.
  14. If they succeed doing that, their team gets a point and they get a chance to throw ball again. But, if all the players are OUT, then the defending team will get a chance to hit the pile of stones.
  15. Fielding team cannot run while having ball in the hand, they can pass the ball to their teammates.
[league_table id="307"  number="4" title="" tid="438,439,440,441"  columns="points" show_full_table_link="0" align="none"  competition="Satodiyu"]
